short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate an email or message reply with one click using ChatGPT, or write in any input box on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
➤Generating Email and Message Replies
     To generate email and message replies, simply click on the extension icon in the chat section or email composition area on websites where the extension directly  works.

➤Writing in Input Fields
     You can also write in any input field on any website by right-clicking and selecting the "Ask Maya" option.

➤Selection feature
     To summarize or generate a reply for any text you select, whether it's an article, comment, or post. Simply highlight the text and right-click to access the option to 'Ask Maya'.

➤Using the Extension Anywhere
      To use the extension anywhere, click on the extension icon in the navigation bar.
